A world without mental illnesses would lead to a society where everyone is more empathetic and understanding towards each other. People would be more likely to seek help and support for their problems, leading to a stronger support system.
The pharmaceutical industry would have to shift its focus to other areas of research and development, potentially leading to breakthroughs in other fields.
People who have struggled with mental illnesses would be able to live a life free from the burden of their condition, leading to improved overall well-being and quality of life.
The stigma surrounding mental illnesses would be completely eradicated, leading to a more accepting and inclusive society.
There would be a significant reduction in the number of suicides and other self-harm-related incidents, leading to a happier and more fulfilling society.
